title: Apartment for rent
posting_body: ['Please read the entire ad!!', 'Video of a similar unit', 'Available September 1st', 'YouTube virtual tour:https://youtu.be/pF6zPoWK9-U', 'Location, community, quality living.', 'It starts here!', 'modern conveniences & entertainment, all within your reach We are conveniently located within a walking distance of downtown Evanston and Northwestern University.', 'Northwestern shuttle bus and the 213-pace bus stop are close by.', 'Beautiful spacious vintage apartment feature three bedrooms with one bath.', 'Has lots of natural light with hardwood floors and bay windows.', 'We have on-site laundry and a fitness room.', 'We provide heat, water, and internet.', 'We do not accept any government assistance.', 'Shorter term lease is available for an additional charge.', 'PET FRIENDLY with approved Pet Agreement.', 'Must be able to pass BACKGROUND CHECK (no felonies or evictions in past 7 yrs), CREDIT CHECK, and meet INCOME REQUIREMENTS (or have cosigner).', 'Features & Amenities', 'Hardwood floors', 'Laundry room on-site', 'Fitness room', 'Parking available', 'Dishwasher and over-the-range microwave', 'Dogs and cats welcome', '24-hour emergency maintenance', 'Heat, water, internet, and included', 'Evanston Vintage Properties LLC', '2129 Ridge Avenue', 'Evanston, IL 60201', 'Property Manager', 'Carla', 'carla@evp.homes']
